ModMetaData.name: Pawns Just Don't Die
ModMetaData.author: explodoboy
ModMetaData.description: Mod Version: 1.0 "JUST KILL ME ALREADY!" This is a very simple mod that prevents most pawns from dying because they've recieved too many bodily injuries. This means that they can only die from bleeing out, losing a vital organ, disease, temperature, or some other thing that causes instantaneous death. This changes nothing else.
